userComment.text: WHAT KIND OF ALARM TIMES OUT WHEN YOU DON'T TOUCH IT. A good alarm should endlessly go off until I turn it off. Terrible to have that as a default setting

developerComment.text: The delay for the alarm to time out is 20 min even then it only snoozed to restart the alarm later on for another 20 minutes.The reason for this are real cases reported by users where they forgot their phone in a locker for example..Many thanks for your feedback. You can change the alarm time out up to 2 hours..usually 20min is fine of everyone ;)
